data.eml:eml: Review of Chinese species of the genus Embrikstrandia Plavilstshikov, 1931 (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae: Cerambycinae) with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Jianhua, Zhou, Shanyi, Chen, Bin (2006): Review of Chinese species of the genus Embrikstrandia Plavilstshikov, 1931 (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae: Cerambycinae) with description of a new species. Zootaxa 1340: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174402
